hotels.title: Idyllic Italian Countryside Opulence in the Heart of Tuscany
hotels.description: Experience a unique blend of rich history and modern restorations at the Casali di Casole countryside retreat. Wake up in elegant Italian-style in one of the estate's grandeur farmhouses or villas, each surrounded by the lush quintessential warmth of the Tuscan hills. Take advantage of the spacious dining areas by booking a private chef to experience worldliness tastes of Tuscany or indulge in the many heated pool and spa options where lore meets luxury.
